notice.text: Kenny Regains Full Sov in Delve

op.title: GET TO THE CHOPPA (XGH Evac Op)
op.text: The massive evacuation from XGH will be happening.

op.title: 8WA CSAA out of reinforced (US TZ KILL TITAN)
op.text: We ninjaed some dreads in pre-dt and reinforced this before evol could time stront (no big deal). We got a PERFECT us timezone timer out of it. We have evidence that this is the real deal, that is, it's actually got a titan/ms in it. Show up for this. Get all of your alts on the second (third? fourth?) CSAA mail.

op.title: K-9 convoy Thurs 11pm US (Fri 0400 EVE)
op.text:
Post if youre interested in a quick (only ~23 jumps) convoy from 2-R/K-9 to Delve. Exact time TBD, on Thursday evening/night US Time (sometime between 0000 and 0400 EVE). Any ship type will be welcome, but if you have a freighter provide your own webber.
I have two BS I want to move (1 on each acct), but if there isn't interest now I may wait a few weeks and try to ninja them out on my own.
I will not be convoying from AZN/XGH or anywhere else to start. The convoy will depart K-9 directly. If you don't have a jump clone in that station, I recommend installing one right away. There's no telling how long station services will remain up given hostile activity in JO and OOYZ.
edit: see my post below. We'll do this after we abort another supercap at 0200 EVE.

op.title: Kenny regains Sov in Delve!
op.text: This is a placeholder until Jargoon finished the notice code.
